questions.question: What is an IP address?
options: A unique numerical identifier for devices on a network
A physical address of a device

questions.question: What does 'HTTP' stand for in website addresses (e.g., http://www.example.com)?
What is DNS (Domain Name System) used for?
options: Resolving domain names to IP addresses

questions.question: What is the function of a router in a computer network?
options: Connects devices within a local network
